imdb.plot outline: The contestants have one minute to solve tasks that require them handle things that we usually have in their household. Each successfully solved the task of bringing forward some very attractive cash prize and introduces athletes to the next game. Transitions from one game to the next level, much heavier, and the weight of tasks increases and the money that contestant wins. On the way to one million dinars contestants wait 10 games must successfully complete, and after 1 and 5 games await them guaranteed sum of 5 000 or, 100 000 dinars. The challenges are pretty easy and almost all of us would be able to solve them that there is no time limit. However, given that the game has to be finished in one minute, the critical success factors are becoming speed and agility.
imdb.title: Savrsen minut
plot: The contestants have one minute to solve tasks that require them handle things that we usually have in their household. Each successfully solved the task of bringing forward some very attractive cash prize and introduces athletes to the next game. Transitions from one game to the next level, much heavier, and the weight of tasks increases and the money that contestant wins. On the way to one million dinars contestants wait 10 games must successfully complete, and after 1 and 5 games await them guaranteed sum of 5 000 or, 100 000 dinars. The challenges are pretty easy and almost all of us would be able to solve them that there is no time limit. However, given that the game has to be finished in one minute, the critical success factors are becoming speed and agility.
